thread.title: BRIEF-New Senior Investment Group Reports Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share Of $0.24

title: BRIEF-New Senior Investment Group Reports Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share Of $0.24
text: 39 AM / in 3 minutes BRIEF-New Senior Investment Group Reports Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share Of $0.24 Reuters Staff Feb 23 (Reuters) - New Senior Investment Group Inc: * NEW SENIOR ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.24 * QTRLY NORMALIZED FFO $0.28 PER BASIC AND DILUTED SHARE * QTRLY AFFO OF $0.24 PER BASIC AND DILUTED SHARE * QTRLY TRIPLE NET SAME STORE CASH NOI INCREASED 4.4% VERSUS. 4Q‘16 * QTRLY TOTAL SAME STORE CASH NOI INCREASED 1.0% VERSUS. 4Q‘16 * QTRLY MANAGED SAME STORE CASH NOI DECREASED 1.5% VERSUS. 4Q’16 Source text for Eikon:
